name: severo-examples
description: A repo with severo lib examples

scripts.build:dev: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] examples/main.js -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] examples/main.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/bundle.js
